messages.message:
Quick update on some infra items
1. For ST, we will need to setup connection to Google Cloud like we did for MT AIHub, etc
2. For large files handling (yet to be implemented), we will need a GCS bucket. 
3. There is a security review that needs to be done for SOC2  (<#C09ES890QSJ|>)
@Jason is owning these items. Posting as an FYI
